Hotel World INC

Introduction
Hotel World INC, are looking to boost their revenue in the off-peak season. This is a notoriously difficult period for hotels to market. Hotel World INC. wants us to gather as much info as possible about the average “off-peak” booking.

Primarily off peak is January through April, and September through November.
